metadata.name: Qatar
metadata.description: Pawradise The Footballer is the exclusive collection of Pawradise that features 32 versions of 32 teams attending the World Cup 2022, bringing color & creativity to the NFT space. By holding Pawradise the Footballer NFT, you can enter Pawâ€™s community with exclusive events such as the VR game, raffles, community gifts, future drops, and much more.
